summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-fifth Avenue No from East Madison Street to East Roy Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing, under Ordinance No. 15526, creating Local Improvement District No. 1430 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
